@theyneedacrane You can normally remove defects from a crystal by heating but this doesn't work for ðŸ’Ž as they tend to turn into graphite!
@theyneedacrane although I *think* ours had more Nitrogen in them (to help speed up the growth process) but not sure.
@theyneedacrane These days the artificially grown diamonds can be grown so well it's really hard to tell them from natural ones.
@theyneedacrane diamonds had 2 mm flats - I think they were like 3 c.
